product_name: Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump
long_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump features a machined steel barrel and piston, a varnished wood handle and an aluminum base.
short_description: Equipped with a very accurate digital gauge that's easy to read, the Lezyne Steel Digital Drive Floor Pump features a machined steel barrel and piston, a varnished wood handle and an aluminum base.
